summary: REQ-16 and REQ-17 appear implemented: Gallery has a clearly labeled "Usable only" toggle that filters `record.usable === true` without reload and persists state via the `usableOnly` query param; Creation Detail reads the same query param to resolve the record index against the filtered+sorted list and preserves the filter state when navigating back to Gallery. One potentially unrequested informational Alert was added to Creation Detail.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an informational Alert on Creation Detail about 4K texture exports and that the gallery stores metadata/thumbnails only.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to adding a usability filter control and URL-persisted navigation consistency; this new informational content is not requested and is unrelated to the filter behavior.
